message.content:
cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.RO, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the problem of mid-air finger writing using web-cam video as input, which involves computer vision and human-computer interaction. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves the use of machine learning algorithms and techniques for accurate detection and tracking of the fingertip, which makes cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) another likely category. The use of Faster R-CNN framework for hand detection and segmentation suggests the possibility of cs.RO (Robotics) as a category. The paper also involves the use of signature function for fingertip detection and tracking, which suggests the possibility of cs.MM (Multimedia) as a category. Finally, the paper involves character recognition experiments, which suggests the possibility of cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as a category.
